Description:
Detects Windows Installer service (msiexec.exe) trying to install MSI packages with SYSTEM privilege

Author: Teymur Kheirkhabarov (idea), Mangatas Tondang (rule), oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Always Install Elevated Windows Installer
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((process_path like '%\msiexec.exe' and (integrity_level = 'system' or integrity_level = 's-1-16-16384')) or ((process_path like '%\windows\installer\%' and process_path like '%msi%') and process_path like '%tmp')) and (username like '%authori%' or username like '%autori%') and  not (parent_process_path = 'c:\windows\system32\services.exe' or parent_process_path like 'c:\programdata\sophos\%' or parent_process_path like 'c:\programdata\avira\%' or (parent_process_path like 'c:\program files\avast software\%' or parent_process_path like 'c:\program files (x86)\avast software\%') or (command like '%\system32\msiexec.exe /v' and parent_command_line like '%\system32\msiexec.exe /v') or (parent_process_path like 'c:\program files\google\update\%' or parent_process_path like 'c:\program files (x86)\google\update\%')))
